name: Andrélon Special Kalmerende anti-roos Shampoo
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Dimethiconol, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Dimethicone, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder (Aloë Vera), Cocos Nucifera Fruit Extract (Kokosmelk), Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Niacinamide (Vitamine B3), Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil (Zonnebloemolie), Glycerin, Glycine, Parfum, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Salicylate, Piroctone Olamine, Citric Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Glycol Distearate, Laureth-23, Poloxamer 407, Sodium Benzoate, Cocamide MEA, Laureth-4, Sine Adipe Lac, PPG-6, Mica, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, CI 17200, CI 77891.
